comments: The CEO effectively communicates strategic goals across diverse stakeholders, ensuring clarity and buy-in. They exhibit strong negotiation skills by balancing conflicting interests to reach beneficial outcomes. Their ability to build trust and foster collaborative relationships further strengthens stakeholder alignment, supporting long-term organizational success.
